actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend section 104 of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act relating to training grants and projects.

summary.text: Revises the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to allow grants for training projects and to provides for the conduct of training by contract. (Amends 33 U.S.C. 1254)

titles.title: A bill to amend section 104 of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act relating to training grants and projects.
